chunks.title: Section 1 - Short title
chunks.structure_path: Recreation Grounds Rates and Taxes Exemption Act, 1981 > Section 1
chunks.text:
This Act may be cited as the Recreation Grounds Rates and Taxes
Exemption Act 1981.

chunks.title: Section 3 - Interpretation
chunks.structure_path: Recreation Grounds Rates and Taxes Exemption Act, 1981 > Section 3
chunks.text:
In this Act--
"rates and taxes" means rates and taxes imposed by or under any
Acts of Parliament but does not include a charge imposed for water supplied or
services provided.

chunks.title: Section 4 - Exemption of certain land from payment of rates
chunks.main_structural_heading: Exemption of certain land from payment of rates
chunks.structure_path: Recreation Grounds Rates and Taxes Exemption Act, 1981 > Section 4
chunks.text:
(1)         Subject to
subsection (2), land is exempt from rates and taxes if--
             (a)         the land--
                   (i)         is vested in a council; or
                   (ii)         is under the care, control or management of a council,
and the public is entitled to access to the land for the purpose of sport
or recreation;
             (b)         the land is vested in trustees or in an association and the public is
entitled, in pursuance of rights granted in perpetuity, to access to the land
for the purpose of sport or recreation;
             (c)         the land is occupied under a lease, licence or permit granted by a
council and is used by the occupier for the purposes of sport or
recreation.
         (2)         The exemption
conferred by subsection (1) does not operate unless the whole of the income
(if any) derived from the land by the council, trustees or association is
applied towards the maintenance, repair or improvement of the land.
